courseDescription:
In this online course Introduction to the Internet of Things (IoT) you will learn all about the Internet of Things. You will gain knowledge on how the term IoT came to be and how the IoT is evolving in a way that will change the way companies manage their workload.

The course starts off with introducing you to the history of IoT, you will learn about how the internet and networks have advanced and also the potential changes that IoT can make in the future. You will learn about the different capabilities that IoT has and how companies can prepare and plan for the future of technologies.

In the second module you will learn about ways in which small to medium sized businesses can benefit from implementing the IoT. You will learn about challenges that can be faced in SMB when wanting to use IoT and solutions in overcoming these, and will inform you on RFID tags, remote monitoring and how to approach a remote monitoring project. The final unit of this course will explain to you how to get started with introducing IoT to your company.
